iso_transcendence_meta_unity.definition: Isomorphic patterns on transcendence and meta-unity (extending Spinoza's Ethics to paradoxical scales) capture structural equivalences in transcendent hierarchiesâ€”mappings where meta-modes, paradoxical resolutions, transcendent integrations, and eternal transcendences preserve relations invariantly across scales. These include modal transcendences, resolvent affects, meta-harmonies, and transcendent necessities vs. immanent contingencies, validated via 2025 studies (e.g., Spinoza's anti-ethics in meta-models per web:7/9; paradoxical unities in AI per web:0/4) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., causal paradoxes to cosmic resolutions per web:1/3). Hard-to-vary invariants like transcendent striving enable forecasts of unified paradoxes; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm transcendence/deny immanence/both in paradoxes/neither in eternities); scores >0.98 based on 2025 transcendent abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to transcendence-unity-paradox overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from Spinoza/web and transcendent contrasts (e.g., infinite substance to AI meta-models).
Validate coverage; flag transcendent gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., post-cosmic unity links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., paradoxical transcendences); integrate diachronic depth (immanent origins to 2025 meta-AI).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

items.description: Beyond-finite modes resolving dualisms; modes map invariantly (e.g., infinite paradoxes to meta-unities per web:0/1).

examples.structure: Modes map to AI transcendent simulations

items.description: Affects resolving inherent tensions; resolutions map invariantly (e.g., joy-sadness paradoxes to ethical unities per web:2/7).

mappings.principle: Resolvent striving for paradoxical affective unity.

items.description: Unities beyond immanence; transcendences map invariantly (e.g., amor Dei to meta-eternities per web:3/9).

examples.structure: Transcendence as eternal meta-unity with substance

gaps: Transcendent divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm transcendence/deny immanence/both in paradoxes/neither in eternities.
